name: ai_chart_assessor-api
description: Next.js API endpoint for chart risk assessment using Gemini.

scripts.build: npm run build:api && npm run build:frontend && npm run copy:static
scripts.build:frontend: git clone https://github.com/flutter/flutter.git /tmp/flutter && (cd /tmp/flutter && git checkout v3.22.6) && /tmp/flutter/bin/flutter precache --web && /tmp/flutter/bin/flutter build web --base-href /
